thread.section_title: Vetapprovedrx Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vetapprovedrx | www.vetapprovedrx.com
thread.title: Fred

author: Fred
title: Fred
text:
Bought meds 3 times from these folks. Each time, they worked to find the most cost effective way to buy. They took care of contacting my vet for the prescription. In one case, because I'd changed a pet's name, and neglected to let the vet know, there was some confusion ( all my fault ). They followed up with me, got the problem resolved, and I got the meds.
And they are just such nice, regular people. Not just order taking, move along to the next call, phone bank drones.
